long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Rewriter: Intelligent Text Rephrasing Tool
Enhance your writing with AI-powered rephrasing technology. AI Rewriter is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you rephrase and rewrite content effortlessly.
Key Features:

Instant content rephrasing with advanced AI
Multiple rephrasing options including tone adjustments
Simple, user-friendly interface
One-click copying of results
Ability to re-use and modify previous results

Perfect for:

Students working on essays and assignments
Content creators looking to refresh their writing
Professionals crafting emails and reports
Anyone wanting to improve their writing clarity and style

How it works:

Input your text in the "Content" box
Choose your desired rephrasing action and tone
Click "Generate" to get your rewritten text instantly
Copy or further refine the results as needed

Upgrade your writing process today with AI Rewriter. Save time and improve your content with just a few clicks!
Note: Free to use.
Support the development: Use the "Donate" button to contribute or "Request a feature" to suggest improvements.
